title: sujonali1819
author: sujonali1819
content: Bounty pool is escrowed by shasan 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FIf you are a writer, video developer, designer, or influencer; this campaign is for you.The campaign is divided into the following tasks and rules.                              The bounty will be managed by TDVToken team. I am just hired to post the bounty thread only. If you have any issues regarding this campaign please contact TDVToken and make sure you have joined on @tdvrewardmarketingcampaign telegram group for support.Quote from: shasan on July 08, 2023, 02:24:36 PMThis is shasandate: 7th AugustI will hold The payment of the bounty campaign as escrow to the wallet 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FEdit:I am responsible only for the token. I am not part of the project. Anyone who wants to invest in this project should do that at his/her own risk. I will only be responsible for the fund which I will hold for the participants.Code:Message: This is shasandate: 7th AugustI will hold The payment of the bounty campaign as escrow to the wallet 0x74894513e0eD3722Cc0ab977C4610Ff18300f55FWallte: bc1qe49zeuwmg8whqa26jgn5pzm6ul4fzpdccz9s4lSignature: IBQDn0LlY9lCn3xDFNFQrscirEqcvINvoEt6tRkYS4Vqd/Fi22Hjt9aX76lkByTo5dZUTZfhtjstazEVhGtKqHc=
